addons.discordlink.lang.fr.messages.description: Managing the link with your Discord server of your hosting provider

manual.step1text: Download the custom bot purchased beforehand by clicking on this link. It will make the link between your Discord server and your host.
manual.step2text: Copy the following token safely. Please note that it will only be displayed once. In case of loss, it will have to be reset.
manual.step3text: Unzip the downloaded file and follow the READ file. ME to install & add the bot to your server.
manual.step4text: Make sure the bot has the necessary permissions to add the role. (The bot must be above the role to be added).

community.step1text: Add the bot to your Discord server by clicking on this invitation link. It will make the link between your Discord server and your host.
community.step2text: Copy the following command to your server. Please note that the key will only be displayed once. In case of loss, it will have to be reset.
community.step3text: Run the following command in your Discord server by adding the client role to it. If successful, the bot will respond with a success message.
community.step4text: Make sure the bot has the necessary permissions to add the role. (The bot must be above the role to be added).

addons.discordlink.lang.fr.messages.cardinfo: Join our Discord server to find our community, get help and additional information like our latest promotions.
